name: no-as-service
description: A lightweight API that returns random rejection or no reasons.

scripts.create-s3: uuid=$(uuidgen | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') && echo "no-as-service-$uuid" > .s3-name && aws s3api head-bucket --bucket $(cat .s3-name) 2>/dev/null || aws s3 mb s3://$(cat .s3-name)

author: hotheadhacker
